pd_0_com_0text: Act two! The meat of the matter, as it might be said.
pd_0_com_1text: So you have a ghost problem! Well that certainly explains why so much has gone wrong recently.
pd_0_com_2text: The plumbing backing up, Tiny Tim getting stuck in the closet, the disembodied voice speaking to you in strange moments of darkness... The list could go on and on really.
pd_0_com_3text: Look on the bright side, all the best plays are haunted. So! Are you going to help the poor lass?
pd_2_com_0text: Splendid! I had a feeling you’d make the right decision.
pd_2_com_1text: It’s a big day for you, the penultimate rehearsal!
pd_2_com_2text: Why don’t you go on and rally the troops? Take heed, however. You have a limited amount of time so you might not be able to talk to everyone at once.
pd_2_com_3text: I’d recommend making sure you check in with as many as possible before the day is out.
pd_3_com_0text:
PLACEHOLDER

The “Act 2” fades and the screen begins to fade into the set.
pd_4_com_0text: Onward, intrepid director! Go forth and mingle!
pd_5_com_0text:
PLACEHOLDER

We fade from black into the STAGE set. THOMAS and MCKENZIE are here, looking over their lines. UI informs the player that they could potentially go to other parts of the theatre (arrows or something, perhaps?). In the LOBBY area, DANIEL is loitering near the stairs. In the BACKSTAGE area, SAMANTHA is in the prop area.
